attributes.action: Move everybody on the old Incapacity benefit to the new Employement and Support Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are getting Incapacity benefit when they really should not be and are making fraudulent claims. If everybody was moved to the new ESA benefit then they could be reassesed to see if they have a medical problem that would affect them working.  Alcholics and drugs users should have to attend a detox program to get the new ESA.
